name: Project: Shiba
summary:
As the world's first half-human hybrid, you know that you're not something that's supposed to exist. Yet, here you are. An outcast in a world that's not your own.
Stuck in a feud between yourself and your encroaching distorted view of the world.
To you, things have always been black and white.
You've accepted your worth on this planet, and have accepted whatever torment the next day may bring.
You've accepted that you belong in captivity, locked away from the world, and have always been nothing more than some science project.
However, one day, in a spur-of-the-moment impulse...
..your entire life will change.
